typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['Sales.txt']) ~> sales
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SalesNew.txt']) ~> salesNew
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SalesUpdate.txt']) ~> salesUpdate
sales, salesNew union(byName: true)~> Unionsales
Unionsales, salesUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdates
UnionUpdates filter(!isNull(Title)) ~> NotNull
NotNull keyGenerate(output(myKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey aggregate(groupBy(ID),
	winner = last(myKey)) ~> Aggregate1
